Key Match Events: Kerry Carpenter matched a career high with four hits
Ryan Greene homered in the first inning
Torkelson, Sweeney homered in the first inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan

Others: Casey Mize started for the Tigers, Tanner Gordon for the Rockies
The Tigers improved to 2-1 in the series against the Rockies
